adDetails: At Auto Glow Body Shop we specialize in high quality auto repair. Our experience and work speaks for itself, you cant find a place to fix your car in this quality or price! With over 25 years of auto body repair, custom paint jobs, matte paint jobs, collision correction, insurance work, we can do the best job in making your car look perfect! Auto Glow can modify and customize your car in anyway you want. Wheels/Tires, Suspension, Body Kits, widebody jobs, tints, films, exhaust and much more.
